casebody.data:
No. 158,

Mise.

Miller v. Pate, Warden. Arthur G. Greenberg, Harry Goiter, William R. Ming, Jr., and Willard J. Lassers for petitioner. Roger W. Hayes for respondent. Maurice Rosenfield for Radio Station W-A-I-T (Chicago) et al., as amici curiae, in support of the petition.

C. A. 7th Cir. Motion of Radio Station W-A-I-T (Chicago) et al. for leave to file a brief, as amici curiae, granted. Certio-rari denied.
